title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Tue May 28 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue May 14 2024 18:33:28 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Tue May 28 2024 12:28:46 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

Added Features: 24

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_clonable_parameter
  2. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_delegatesFocus_parameter
  3. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_serializable_parameter
  4. Element ➞ checkVisibility ➞ options_opacityProperty_parameter
  5. Selection ➞ collapse ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
  6. Selection ➞ extend ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
  7. Selection ➞ getComposedRanges ➞ returns_multiple_ranges
  8. Selection ➞ setBaseAndExtent ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees

css

  1. properties ➞ place-items ➞ anchor-center
  2. properties ➞ place-self ➞ anchor-center
  3. properties ➞ position-try-options ➞ inset-area

html

  1. elements ➞ fencedframe ➞ allow
  2. elements ➞ fencedframe ➞ height
  3. elements ➞ fencedframe ➞ width
  4. elements ➞ template ➞ shadowrootdelegatesfocus
  5. elements ➞ template ➞ shadowrootserializable

javascript

  1. builtins ➞ DataView ➞ getFloat16
  2. builtins ➞ DataView ➞ setFloat16
  3. builtins ➞ Float16Array ➞ Float16Array
  4. builtins ➞ Float16Array
  5. builtins ➞ Math ➞ f16round

webextensions

  1. api ➞ declarativeNetRequest ➞ getDynamicRules ➞ filter
  2. api ➞ declarativeNetRequest ➞ getSessionRules ➞ filter
  3. api ➞ management ➞ ExtensionInfo ➞ installType

Removed Features: 2

Expand to see the full list

api

  1. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ init_clonable_parameter
  2. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ init_delegatesFocus_parameter

Implementation Status Changes: +29, -0

Added (29)

  • ShadowRoot ➞ getHTML
    Added to Safari  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines

    • css

    1. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ auto
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines
    2. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ hidden
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines
    3. properties ➞ content-visibility ➞ visible
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines
    4. properties ➞ d
      Added to Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines

    api

      Added to Firefox, Chrome  ➞  Now in 2 of 3 engines
    2. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_delegatesFocus_parameter
      Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines
    3. Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_serializable_parameter
      Added to Chrome  ➞  Now in 1 of 3 engines
    4. Element ➞ checkVisibility ➞ options_opacityProperty_parameter
      Added to Firefox, Chrome, Safari  ➞  Now in 3 of 3 engines
    5. Selection ➞ collapse ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 1 of 3 engines
    6. Selection ➞ extend ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 1 of 3 engines
    7. Selection ➞ getComposedRanges ➞ returns_multiple_ranges
      Added to Firefox  ➞  Now in 1 of 3 engines
    8. Selection ➞ setBaseAndExtent ➞ accepts_nodes_in_shadow_trees
